Metadata: Seafood 4 health: healthy minds, healthy hearts, healthy bodies and healthy fishery resources: outreach education for healthcare providers and practitioners and their Clientele
"ADA Convention, Poster Session Wellness & Public Health," San Diego, California, September 24-27, 2011.

Learn how to frame the message about seafood in light of its health benefits and current US Dietary Guidelines. There may not be a simple message such as "Seafood is Good for You" or "Eat Seafood Twice a Week" - but an integrated approach to create l.
